channel.title: CVE Feed for Perials -- Simple Social Share
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Perials -- Simple Social Share

item.title: CVE-2024-37551|2024-08-02T03:57:39.681Z -- perials -- simple%20social%20share
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Perials Simple Social Share allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Simple Social Share: from n/a through 3.0.
